message.body: Are u around campus? Want to find a food truck for lunch?
We're on our way to DMI place
Oh Dmi place!
Yes but we have to solve some problem
Ok u solve problem. I have a meeting soon so i will get lunch alone:(
Where are you?
When's your meeting?
I'm just kidding around. I am in Dmi on 4th floor. My meeting on 3rd floor at 130.
I made myself a study space here
What time should we meet of we want to have lunch with you?
Oh it's ok. You guys work I'll probably go get something in 30 min.... I can stop by and see if you want to come?
Ok! We're in DMI place
Ok dokey!
Are we about to leave?
Kid's ready! :D
Sky!!! I'm doing Brian's project on motorcycles!!!!!!
It's going to be awesome ... About how cool and dangerous they are
You helped me come up with the idea! Thanks!
@_@ sounds cool! I just get back to school! Are you still upstairs?
Yes yes
Are you staying here for a bit or going home
Stay here maybe till 10 or 11
Sofie, what time tomorrow am I supposed to be at the gallery if I want to participate in the show?
Sky!!
I am still in lazy saturday pajamas!
Actually I'm still on my bed...
Hahahaha
Ok well we are both enjoying out saturday!!!
I never want to wake up on the weekends
I ask my bf to send the memory box and the film for me, do you think they're ok for the show? Or I should print out some of my photos for the show...
Will it come by tomorrow?
I'm lying in the bed, enjoying Saturday sunshine from my sky light window...
I think it's great! Why don't you print a photo too...
They're here now
Sky light! How nice! I bet you miss your puppy. I miss my ex boyfriends puppy. Oh That's great!!!
Hahahaha! ex bf's puppy ... Yes I wish my Piggy(my puppy's name) was here and we could walk by Jamaica Pond in sunny Saturday morning...
Awww
My ex's pup is named Buck-Nasty. It is a funny name. I call him buck and he loves to cuddle and be in bed with me. I am sending u pictures! He is so cute!
Oh I got the pic! He is sooo cute! My piggy and me love to in bed with each other, too :D
Yeah they look like they are similar kinds of puppies... Like they are both very playful
Thank you for forwarding the mail regarding the show. What should I prepared except for the works? For example information sheet or ? I've never participated in a show @_@
Oh ok how exciting for you!
I mean "in addition" to the works ...
You need to write out and hand in with your pieces: the title of the pieces, dimensions, and media ..., I'll help you out tomorrow
Thank you! I'll be in the Computer Art Center at noon to print out my photos
Do I need a frame for my photo work?
You need it be ready to hang... Doesn't have to be frame but has to "wall friendly"....
Maybe tacks?
I see
